remarks: Two subspaces in a proper subset relationship imply the existence of an atom less than or equal to one but not the other.  ( ~ chpssati analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lpssat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lpssat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lpssat.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lpssat.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
lpssat.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lpssat.l $e |- ( ph -> T C. U ) $.
lpssat $p |- ( ph -> E. q e. A ( q C_ U /\ -. q C_ T ) ) $.
$d A q $.
$d S q $.
$d T q $.
$d U q $.
$d W q $.
